channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lorry from the works being carried out has caused a number of slabs to break and are VERY uneven and unstable, 19th May
item.description:
Outside number 9, Severn Road GL525QA

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Severn Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous potholes all along this road, 19th May
item.description:
Numerous potholes all along this road from the junction all the way along past the school. The road is a disgrace and has been for some time. Please repair all of the potholes/craters!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fairfield Parade, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Developers Signage, 19th May
item.description:
A developer has placed a sign on the official finger post. This seriously hinders the view north along the A435 from the junction with Malleson Road. This location is a known accident black spot and anything that hinders visibility is of concern. Please can you arrange for it to be removed before it contibutes to a serious accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Malleson Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Ditch Letter
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 19th May
item.description:
Drain has been smelling bad for a while and looks like a oily film on the water and the sump is still partially full. Please can this be investigated as it is very unpleasant.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yellow lines too close to island on road. Parking issues., 19th May
item.description:
Barley Road, island at the top of the road. The yellow lines are not going far enough along the road to make sure there is enough space to safely pass through. Emergency vehicles would not be able to pass through without having to significantly slow down with risk to damage to their cars and the parked ones.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Barley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Drain blocked with dirt/dust, 19th May
item.description:
The drain is on a lane I think called Langdon Terrace between Ewlyn Road and Langdon Road. I am not sure if the lane is a public highway or not but the drain runs into the drains on Langdon Road and so the dirt/dust will run down to public highway if not cleaned out quickly before we get heavy rain. As you can see from picture it is very full and so would not want this to wash down into drainage system.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Langdon Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A number of large potholes around the church, 19th May
item.description:
There are a number of large potholes near to the church on the corner at Down Hatherley Lane. These potholes have been present for at least 6 months and need sorting ASAP. I keep having to swerve onto the opposite side of the road otherwise I will likely pop a tyre.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Down Hatherley Lane, Down Hatherley, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carisbrooke Road, Gloucester
